    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line​(double x1,
            double y1,
            double x2,
            double y2,
            int r,
            int g,
            int b,
            double strokeWidth)
        Draws a Line starting and ending at specified points
        Parameters:
        x1 - X-coordinate of the starting point of the line
        y1 - Y-coordinate of the starting point of the line
        x2 - X-coordinate of the ending point of the line
        y2 - Y-coordinate of the ending point of the line
        r - sets red color of the stroke
        g - sets green color of the stroke
        b - sets blue color of the stroke
        strokeWidth - sets width of the stroke

      • Line

        public Line​(double x1,
            double y1,
            double length,
            double angle,
            int r,
            int g,
            int b,
            double strokeWidth,
            boolean placeHolder)
        draws line given starting coordinates and length and angle
        Parameters:
        x1 - starting x-coordinate
        y1 - starting y-coordiante
        length - length of line
        angle - angle of line
        r - sets red color of the stroke
        g - sets green color of the stroke
        b - sets blue color of the stroke
        strokeWidth - sets width of the stroke
        placeHolder - just there to make two constructors different

        Draws a Line at specified coordinates
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        drawer - The PApplet drawing surface that is used to draw the line
        Precondition:
